parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.24

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Mines

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>Returns an array of all mines detected by a given side

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''detectedMines''' side

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> side: [[side]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[detectedMines]] [[west]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[detectedMines]] [[side]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[allMines]], [[mineDetectedBy]], [[createMine]], [[mineActive]], [[revealMine]]
</value></part></template></root>
